front.title: Fast Router Discovery with AP Notification

abstract.t: This document presents Fast Router Discovery with AP Notification. For seamless handoff, a mobile node MUST quickly discover its new access router. In our proposal AP caches Router Advertisement message and sends it to a new mobile node as soon as L2 association is made. We present a way for AP to cache necessary RA. By putting 'RA Caching' and 'AP Notification' functionality on AP, we get the optimized result without IPv6 standard change.
